# .NET SDK Requirements

## Required Checks

| Requirement | Check Command | Min Version | Purpose | Auto Install | Installation Instructions |
|-------------|---------------|-------------|---------|--------------|--------------------------|
| .NET SDK | `dotnet --version` | 9.0.306 | .NET development kit | false | Install .NET SDK with version at least higher than defined in global.json file in the repo root, from https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download |
